title: Vice President Hosts Egyptian Ambassador, Pledges Stronger Youth-Focused, Bilateral Cooperation
description: Vice President, Professor Naana Jane Opoku-Agyemang, has reaffirmed Ghana’s commitment to deepening ties with the Arab Republic of Egypt, with a strong focus
content:
By Racheal Quartey and Rukayatu Musah
Vice President, Professor Naana Jane Opoku-Agyemang, has reaffirmed Ghana’s commitment to deepening ties with the Arab Republic of Egypt, with a strong focus on youth development, technology, and mutually benefic... [2772 chars]
